title: OPL Breakdown: Episode 3 - Special Guest DW Sharp

embed.description: 0:00 - Introduction 2:02 - The 2017 DW Roster formation 7:05 - When did Sharp decide he wanted to fully commit to Coaching Dire Wolves?

body: Discussion of DW's season including their Korean boot camp, the 6 man roster, winning the split and their performance at MSI.
